question: Watanni nawa ne ke da kwanaki 31 a kalandar turawa?
translated_question: How many months have 31 days in the Gregorian calendar?
answers: ['kwana talatin ne a satumba, Afrilu, juni da Nuwanba, ragowar talatin da ɗaya, Fabrairu na da ashirin da takwas, Amma shekara mai tsallake na zuwa sau ɗaya a hudu, Faburairu na da ƙarin kwana ɗaya kenan.']
translated_answer: ['Thirty days has September, April, June, and November, All the rest have thirty-one, Save February at twenty-eight, But leap year, coming once in four, February then has one day more.']
